"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558cd87b63687279f600031b#post_558cd87b63687279f600031b
Primero uno, ybliego el otro. Lleva un padrino vestido de negro, yo seré el mío propio. Al amanecer del 5o día se encontrarán en el callejón del aguacate. Haremos vaquita para las balas.
topics.author: 520901737f123b14a50000d8

topics.body:
This might make superhero fans angry, but I was reading numberwise why superheroes are so popular right now; simply put: Avengers movies are making more money than all other comic book superheroes combined.


When Avengers 3 comes out, considering that probably there won't be a fourth, the industry is going to crash really fucking hard cause Avengers is massively over-inflating the industry into a economic bubble; once Avengers is done well you get the idea.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558cdd186368726749000d0e#post_558cdd186368726749000d0e
Oh; I knew Infinity wars was going to be a thing, but I don't keep that up to date with that sort of thing considering I'm not a fan, *BUT* you get what I mean though.  Once avengers is over it will essentially be the end for the superhero hype.

On the plus side for superhero fans, "Woohoo!  People are going to continue to be interested in superheroes for another four years!"
On the downside for superhero fans, "Ah crap!  Once Avengers 4 comes out the superhero industry is going to go through a massive bust!"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
from tumblr

"you know how a lot of things are spoiled for you b/c its the internet and tumblr has a lot of gifs, images, and all that. like its nigh impossible to go into a fandom without having things spoiled for them. _however_ i still have _no fucking earthly clue_ what jojo’s bizzare adventure is even _remotely_ about. the power of eyeliner? maybe"

as someone who doesn't follow JJBA, that just about sums up my feelings about it
